preconditions.precondition: The developer must have appropriate permissions to upgrade dataset instance

mainSequence.step: Requesting dataset instance upgrade information from the Dataset Management System
Querying available dataset type versions from the Dataset Version Control
Displaying available versions with upgrade impacts to the developer
Selecting a new version for upgrade
Initiating upgrade process for the dataset instance in the Version Control
Checking application dependencies in the Application Deployment
Confirming compatibility with the Version Control
Preparing dataset instance upgrade in the Database
Executing upgrade to the new version in the Database
Updating pipeline configuration to include the new dataset version
Validating compatibility of the new dataset version in the Pipeline
Updating Pipeline configuration with the validated information
Notifying the developer about the successful upgrade completion
